title: Diffusion Models as Optimizers for Efficient Planning in Offline RL
details: R Huang, Y Pei, G Wang, Y Zhang, Y Yang, P Wang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Diffusion models have shown strong competitiveness in offline reinforcement learning tasks by formulating decision-making as sequential generation. However, the practicality of these methods is limited due to the lengthy inference processes …
